thread.title: BRIEF-Basic Energy Services Announces Withdrawal Of Proposed Senior Secured Notes Offering

title: BRIEF-Basic Energy Services Announces Withdrawal Of Proposed Senior Secured Notes Offering

organizations.name: reuters staff basic energy services inc

text:
Basic Energy Services Inc:
* BASIC ENERGY SERVICES ANNOUNCES WITHDRAWAL OF PROPOSED SENIOR SECURED NOTES OFFERING
* BASIC ENERGY SERVICES INC - DECIDED NOT TO PROCEED WITH PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFERING OF $300 MILLION OF SENIOR SECURED NOTES
* BASIC ENERGY SERVICES - IN EVENT THE NEW ABL FACILITY BECOMES EFFECTIVE, NEW ABL FACILITY WILL REPLACE EXISTING $120 MILLION ASSET-BASED CREDIT FACILITY
* BASIC ENERGY-CONTINUING TO ENGAGE IN ADVANCED CONVERSATIONS WITH LENDERS TO SECURE NEW, UP-TO $150 MILLION 5-YEAR REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY,AS SAID BEFORE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
